items.sentence: Before I get out of bed, I spend a little time thinking about what I\'ll be doing the rest of the day.
Just saying you don\'t like fish because of the bones is not really a good reason for not liking fish.
It\'s important to take good care of your teeth so you\'ll be able to eat properly when you get older.
I looked in my closet for something to wear, but couldn\'t find anything appropriate for the occasion.
There have been a lot of complaints from students about the amount of homework that Mr. Jackson gives.
Tom put his career on the back burner and became a house husband, to enable Mary to pursue her career.
I think all the coffee that I\'ve been drinking in the afternoon is why I haven\'t been sleeping well.
I was just wondering if I could borrow three hundred dollars from you. I can pay you back next Monday.
Tom is such a picky eater that he'll diligently pick the stringy pith from an orange before eating it.
Tom went over to where Mary was sitting and gave her the envelope that John had given him to give her.
Tom thought he'd lost his wallet, but eventually found it after searching the house for an hour or so.
I wish I'd planted apple trees here when I first bought this property. If I had, we'd have apples now.

A man with a long beard was playing the saxophone and a young girl, perhaps his daughter, was dancing.
I wasn't very good at speaking French until Tom and I started speaking French to each other every day.
Tom has a brother and two sisters. His brother lives in Australia and his sisters live in New Zealand.

A young boy, who couldn\'t have been more than five years old, asked Tom how to get to the post office.
